title: TrueNAS Migration
shortDescription: Migrating from underpowered Synology DS124 to custom TrueNAS server with i5-12500, 32GB RAM, and 2x8TB mirrored drives for 4K Plex transcoding and more.

title: Bitty 2.0
shortDescription: Migrated Bitcoin price notifications from Home Assistant to standalone Python bot on GitHub Actions. Fixed timing issues, duplicate notifications, and baseline logic problems.

title: BitAxe
shortDescription: Running a BitAxe solo Bitcoin miner integrated with Home Assistant for monitoring hashrate, temperature, and power consumption. Learning about Bitcoin mining while participating in the lottery for finding a block.

title: Home Assistant
shortDescription: Self-hosting journey from zero coding experience to custom dashboards consolidating financial tracking, plant care, Tesla control, and security cameras. Replaced Notion, Google Nest, and multiple apps with one unified system.
